skill_sections.title: Software Development (Primary: Java)
skill_sections.text: Creative Software Development — Passion for designing and building unique programs from the ground up. I enjoy turning ideas into functional tools with a personal touch, blending creativity with solid coding practices.

skill_sections.title: Individual / Team Development
skill_sections.text: Designed and managed server systems; created custom games both individually and collaboratively with a large group, occasionally assisting in project leadership with other creators and developers — particularly within Minecraft-based projects.

skill_sections.title: Interdepartmental Support and Service
skill_sections.text: Provided customer support with a focus on problem solving and effective communication between departments to ensure smooth operations and client satisfaction.
